pypore¶

pypore is a package for analyzing translocation data. It is written in Cython, a superset of Python that provides an optimising static compiler. Cython compiles Python and Cython code to C code, then the C code is compiled with the systems C compiler. Basically, this allows you to significantly speed up computationally intensive Python code.

Using pypore¶

If you are trying to use a module with a .pyx extension (ie Cython code) it must be compiled first. This can be accomplished by importing cythonsetup

Install Python v2.7¶
